sentences.en: Am I supposed to run around capturing strays to the vet for a quick'snip Snip?
sentences.cn: 四处去捕捉流浪动物,然后强制带到兽医处,来个快速结扎 吗 ?

sentences.en: Barber: It isn't that. Sometimes I snip off a bit of a customer's ear.
sentences.cn: 理发师: 不是这么会事, 而是因为我常常会剪掉客人们一点耳朵什么的.

sentences.en: But when off, she whisked her little scissors out of her apron pocket, and snip!
sentences.cn: 不过,当她清醒的时候, 她从围裙口袋里拿出了那把小剪刀, 咔嚓!

sentences.en: He has now begun to snip away at the piece of paper.
sentences.cn: 现在他已经开始剪这张纸。

sentences.en: I had to take my little scissors and snip them away.
sentences.cn: 我只好翻出小剪子把新睫毛都剪了.

sentences.en: I sit down, thread a needle, snip off an old button.
sentences.cn: 我坐下来，穿好针，剪下一枚旧纽扣。

sentences.en: I snipped the string and untied the parcel.
It's a snip at only 50 p!
Snip of the green on the carrot and glue onto place as the nose.
sentences.cn: 切掉胡萝卜的叶子,粘在雪人鼻子的位置上.

sentences.en: Snip off the excess tape ends.
sentences.cn: 剪断关闭多余的磁带结束.

sentences.en: These typewriters are a snip at 50.
sentences.cn: 这些打字机是50英镑一台的便宜货.

sentences.en: This snip is not from any known gene and its function is unknown.
sentences.cn: 然而这种标记不是来源于已知基因,它的功能不为人知.

sentences.en: White on toes and slim white snip on center line of face permissible.
sentences.cn: 白色足爪或在脸部中间出现白筋是允许的.

trans.tran_cn: 剪，剪切声，（剪下的）片断，小片，藐小的人
trans.tran_en: a quick small cut with scissors
to cut something by making quick cuts with scissors
